labels.name: Name
labels.linked-stores: Linked stores (customers can use their credentials to access these stores)

placeholders.name: Please enter name
placeholders.linked-stores: This store has no linked stores

descriptions.code: This will be used as the store's primary key, as well as a part of the URL for store selection in Storefront
descriptions.name: This name will be displayed in Store Manager
descriptions.catalog: Any physical or virtual catalog associated with this store

storeNotificationsWidget.title: Notification
storeNotificationsWidget.blade-title: List of notification types for store {{id}}

store-delete.title: Confirm Delete
store-delete.message: Are you sure you want to delete this Store?

store-save.title: Save changes
store-save.message: The store has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

tax-provider-save.title: Save changes
tax-provider-save.message: The tax provider has been modified. Do you want to save changes?

permissions.store:loginOnBehalf: Login on behalf of a customer

TaxCalculationEnabled.title: Enable tax calculation
TaxCalculationEnabled.description: Toggle it off to disable tax calculation on Storefront

AllowAnonymousUsers.title: Allow anonymous users to visit the store
AllowAnonymousUsers.description: Toggle it off to prevent anonymous users from accessing this store

IsSpa.title: SPA
IsSpa.description: Toggle on or off depending on whether this store is an SPA

SeoLinksType.title: SEO links
SeoLinksType.description: Determines the type of links for products and categories. Examples: 1. Long:  /virtual-parent-category/physical-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product, 2. Collapsed: /virtual-parent-category/my-cool-category/my-cool-product, 3. Short: /my-cool-product, 4. None: /product/123

EmailVerificationEnabled.title: Email address verification
EmailVerificationEnabled.description: Enables the email verification process for users

EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.title: Round price for total calculation
EnablePriceRoundingForTotalsCalculation.description: Enables price rounding for total calculation in the Order and Cart modules

VirtoCommerce.Store.description: Export or import stores with all related data

StoreDynamicEmailNotification.description: The customer will get an email notification when they submit a form (e.g. the Contact Us form) on Storefront
